name: Planet Invaders (boctavian96)
description:
A simple game created for the 'My First Game Jam: Winter 2023'.

Your objective is to Grow you planetary empire and eliminate all the rivals from the map.

IMPORTANT: Recommended browser for this game is Google Chrome.

Controls

  • Left Mouse Button: Select one of your planets.
  • Right Mouse Button: Attack/Reinforce the designed target

Credits

Programming: boctavian96

Art and support: Adeleena

UI: Libgdx default UI theme

Sound effect created by: 

 Sci-Fi Dramatic Theme by Twisterium | https://www.twisterium.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
